posts.content: Will there be any BWA founding members at Bug Jam, especially Friday??

Well didn't bump into or spot anyone I recognised so here's the first run for my bus B690
The first bus up the strip Friday.



Second run



My westy still had most of it's interior and it still needs to go on a rolling road.
Hopefully more to come, certainly possible 15"s in her.

modifiedbrian wrote:Well didn't bump into or spot anyone I recognised so here's the first run for my bus B690
The first bus up the strip Friday.



Second run



My westy still had most of it's interior and it still needs to go on a rolling road.
Hopefully more to come, certainly possible 15"s in her.


Julian Hunt will defo of been there I'm sure, he probably photographed your run!

If he was there and saw you I'd say that's proof.

It would be a shame if no one from BWA was there this weekend to witness your run especially as it seems you managed to get 2 runs in the space of half an hour!

I thought it would be rammed so went round early to wait. In the end it wasn't as bad as I thought. Was always only going to do 2 runs just she how she'd handle.

Ended up bumping into Paul Venners. We hadn't seen each other for over 20 yrs. He ended up interviewing me. He has my first split which is now roof chopped and space framed I think.

Trying to post a link of my 2nd run but not having much success.



If it don't count I'll be at action.
